game.name: Panic Protocol
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A 1-4 player co-op horror game, where you guide your friends through a dangerous research facility. Use the CCTV system to observe enemies, set traps and interact with the environment. Extract with the research materials before time runs out.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 1-4 player co-op horror game, where you guide your friends through a dangerous research facility. Use the CCTV system to observe enemies, set traps and interact with the environment. Extract with the research materials before time runs out.
